```{r}
library(here)
WM <- st_read(here("source/World_Countries_Generalized", "World_Countries_Generalized.shp"))

library(dplyr)
gii <- read.csv(here("source", "HDR21-22_Composite_indices_complete_time_series.csv"), na.strings=c(""))%>%
  dplyr::select(2,starts_with("gii"))

diff_gii <- gii%>%
  dplyr::select(1,"gii_2010", "gii_2019")%>%
  mutate(diff_2019_2010= gii_2019 - gii_2010)

library(janitor)
GiiDiffDataMap <- WM %>% 
  clean_names() %>%
  left_join(., 
            diff_gii,
            by = c("country" = "country"))

#tmap_mode("plot")
#qtm(GiiDiffDataMap, 
    #fill = "diff_2019_2010")

tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(GiiDiffDataMap) + 
tm_polygons("diff_2019_2010", 
        style="jenks",
        palette="YlOrBr",
        midpoint=NA,
        title="Differences",
        alpha = 0.5) + 
   tm_layout(title = "Differences in global gender inqeuality between 2010 and 2019", legend.position = c("left", "bottom"))
```
